content: What modern-day country was home to the ancient civilization of Sparta?

Sparta was located in the southeastern portion of the Peloponnese, in what is now southern Greece. The ancient city-state was part of Laconia, one of the regions of the Peloponnese. Today, the site of ancient Sparta is located near the modern Greek city of Sparti. So, the modern-day country that was home to the ancient civilization of Sparta is Greece.
